snippet: Dissecting the Congress Party’s Uttar Pradesh debacle.
abstract: Dissecting the Congress Party’s Uttar Pradesh debacle.
lead_paragraph: “Defeat is usually an orphan,” Dan Morrison wrote for Latitude blog in The New York Times. “But the election debacle of Congress, India’s ruling party, in Uttar Pradesh on Tuesday has a clear patrimony: pandering to the state’s 36 million Muslims,” he writes.

headline.main: The Politics of Pandering in India
